extDescription.message: A Cookie Whitelist Manager that helps protect your privacy. Automatically removes unwanted cookies.

optionsInfo.message:
Recommended usage:
  • add desired sites to your whitelist
  • enable Clear unwanted cookies on startup (below)
If you do not want to remove unwanted cookies automatically you have to clear your cookies manually using the Vanilla icon in your omnibar.

optionsClearCookiesOnStartup.message: Clear unwanted cookies on startup, or

optionsProtectCookiesWarning1.message:
With this option enabled, you can now enable Chrome's Keep local data only until I quit my browser - Vanilla will protect your cookies.
You can find this setting in Chrome, Options, Show advanced settings, Privacy - Content settings.

optionsProtectCookiesWarning2.message:
With this option disabled, please make sure that you are not using Keep local data only until I quit my browser in Chrome, otherwise all your cookies will be deleted!
You can find this setting in Chrome, Options, Show advanced settings, Privacy - Content settings.

optionsAutoDelDark.message: Auto delete unwanted cookies after 30 minutes

optionsAutoDelDarkNever.message: Do not auto delete unwanted cookies

optionsAutoDelDarkMinutes.message: Auto delete unwanted cookies after $minutes$ minutes

optionsShowUpdates.message: Show changes when this extension is updated

optionsHideTabIcon.message: Hide the Vanilla omnibar icon - you will have to manage your whitelist manually on this options page!

optionsFeedbackText.message:
If you want to manage your local storage please star this Chrome Issue!

Do you like Vanilla? Leave a comment and rating!

optionsFeedbackBug.message: Did you find a bug? If you are a developer you can now fork Vanilla on GitHub!

optionsWhitelist.message: Whitelist: cookies from these sites will not be deleted

optionsWhitelistHelp.message: *. will include all subdomains of a site. E.g. *.google.com will include www.google.com, docs.google.com, mail.google.com, ... as well as google.com

optionsExportHelp.message: To export click Export first, then copy the entries from the box below. To import first paste all entires in the box below (one per line) and then click Import.

popupErrorEmpty.message: Whitelist is empty - please add some sites!

updatedInfo.message: Vanilla Cookie Manager was updated (you can turn this page off in options).
